titleInfo.title: The North Shore of the Dead Sea

mods.abstract: The Dead Sea from North Shore in Israel/Jordan; driftwood and sand on the curving north shore of the Dead Sea, foreground; small island (middle ground); mountain range on opposite shore (background); "Frith P 113" in black at bottom left corner; "THE NORTH SHORE OF THE DEAD SEA. Frith.Photo.1857" in black across bottom of print on mat; (Original number unknown, print given 1997.5.20 based on information in accession record, M.K., M.R.J., 2/8/2013).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
